fulltextMetadata.title: CloudSync Pro Product Roadmap 2025 H1

feature_description: Sync across AWS, Azure, GCP regions
Integration with Slack and Microsoft Teams
requirement_description: Setup for multi-region and AI features
Review for security and compliance standards
milestone_description: Release of version 3.0 Enterprise with multi-region sync, advanced role-based control, audit, and API features
Release of version 3.1 AI-Powered with smart categorization, duplicate detection, NLP, and automation features

fulltextMetadata.summary: CloudSync Pro's 2025 H1 roadmap focuses on enterprise capabilities in Q1 with multi-region synchronization, advanced permissions, and API v2, followed by AI-powered features in Q2 including smart categorization and natural language search. Critical priorities include security enhancements and performance optimization, with success measured by high enterprise adoption and 99.9% uptime. Implementation depends on infrastructure, machine learning, and security teams for multi-region setup, AI model training, and compliance reviews.
